messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-playground
Sorry about the diff on this one. I switched from tabs to 2-spaces for indent, to match the rest of the JS code. It's mostly just moving code around.
